abstract: Gunman opens fire on block party in Philadelphia, injuring seven people; in separate incident, gunman at block party in Detroit kills one person and wounds nine.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen opened fire on gatherings in both cities on Saturday night. Among the wounded in Philadelphia were two children.

headline.main: One Dead and 16 Injured After Block Party Shootings in Detroit and Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: Block Party Shootings in Two Cities Leave 1 Dead and 16 Injured

snippet: Gunmen opened fire on gatherings in both cities on Saturday night. Among the wounded in Philadelphia were two children.
